messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, I'm having problems with my 15-year-old son, Sean, at 3845 Westgate Circle in Magna.
Okay, that's 3845 Westgate Circle?
Yes.
Is this a house or an apartment?
It's a house.
All right, what's going on?
I don't know where he found it but he has his dad's gun and he's threatening us. He's saying he's going to run away.
Are there other weapons in the home?
I thought they were all locked up, but he's telling me he found one. Oh my God, he's holding it. Sean, get out of your sister's room!
Where is he right now?
He's in his sister's room with the gun.
What's his name?
Sean, and he's leaving. He's got a big black trench coat on.
How old is he?
Is he leaving the house?
Yes
Which way is he going?
He's going south, he has a ski mask on, and a black outfit.
Do you know what kind of gun it is?
It's a Colt 45.
That's a handgun. Is he coming back towards your house?
No, it looks like he's going straight and now he's heading west.
Alright, I'm going to transfer you to the dispatcher who will get officers over to your house, okay?
Okay.
Hi, I need you to get out here as soon as possible.
I have several officers en route at this time. I'm just going to keep you on the line. Did he make any threats toward you?
I don't know what he's going to do. He said something about breaking a lock to the storage room. I don't know if he was serious.
Did he have any other weapons besides the gun?
Not that I know of.
Do you know if the gun was loaded?
I have no idea.
Oh my God, I heard gunshots!
Are you and your family safe?
We're inside the house.
Stay inside the house. Do not go out there.
I can see him outside shooting.
Stay on the phone with me, okay? Officers are on their way.
I'm so scared.
I understand. We're getting help to you as quickly as we can. Just stay on the line.
I hear more gunshots.
Stay inside and do not approach the windows. Officers are almost there.
Okay.
Is everyone in the house okay right now?
Yes, we're just scared.
Understandable. Stay calm, we have officers en route. Just stay on the line and keep yourself safe.
Alright, I'm going to go ahead and have someone come over and talk with you, okay? I'm going to disconnect the call, but someone will be over shortly to speak with you.
Okay. Thank you.
You're welcome. Goodbye.
